snippet: Joon Kim, a partner at Cleary Gottlieb Steen & Hamilton, is leaving the law firm to join the United States attorney's office in Manhattan as chief counsel.
abstract: Joon Kim, a partner at Cleary Gottlieb Steen & Hamilton, is leaving the law firm to join the United States attorney's office in Manhattan as chief counsel.

headline.main: Cleary Gottlieb Partner to Join Prosecutor's Office as Chief Counsel
